snippet: Syrians who take their cues from President Bashar al-Assad’s office were advised to stay up late Wednesday, so they can watch “a television dialogue” on the Fox News Channel between their leader and Dennis Kucinich.
abstract: Syrians who take their cues from President Bashar al-Assad’s office were advised to stay up late Wednesday, so they can watch “a television dialogue” on the Fox News Channel between their leader and Dennis Kucinich.

headline.main: Assad's Office Promotes Fox News Interview With Kucinich
